result.term: pressure, pressure level, force per unit area
result.definition: the force applied to a unit area of surface; measured in pascals (SI unit) or in dynes (cgs unit)
result.example: "the compressed gas exerts an increased pressure"
result.synonyms: imperativeness, pressure, press, force per unit area, pressure sensation, air pressure, pressure level, insistence, pressing, insistency, atmospheric pressure

result.example: "the public brought pressure to bear on the government"
result.synonyms: imperativeness, press, force per unit area, pressure sensation, air pressure, pressure level, insistence, pressing, insistency, atmospheric pressure

result.definition: the act of pressing; the exertion of pressure
result.example: "he gave the button a press"; "he used pressure to stop the bleeding"; "at the pressing of a button"
result.synonyms: insistence, pressure level, military press, closet, force per unit area, public press, press, imperativeness, air pressure, crush, atmospheric pressure, wardrobe, printing press, pressing, pressure sensation, mechanical press, pressure, insistency, jam

result.definition: the state of demanding notice or attention
result.example: "the insistence of their hunger"; "the press of business matters"
result.synonyms: insistence, insistency, instancy, military press, closet, pressure level, force per unit area, public press, press, imperativeness, air pressure, insisting, atmospheric pressure, wardrobe, printing press, pressing, pressure sensation, mechanical press, crush, pressure, jam

result.definition: the somatic sensation that results from applying force to an area of skin
result.example: "the sensitivity of his skin to pressure and temperature was normal"
result.synonyms: imperativeness, pressure, press, force per unit area, pressure sensation, air pressure, pressure level, insistence, pressing, insistency, atmospheric pressure

result.definition: an oppressive condition of physical or mental or social or economic distress
result.synonyms: imperativeness, press, force per unit area, pressure sensation, air pressure, pressure level, insistence, pressing, insistency, atmospheric pressure

result.definition: the pressure exerted by the atmosphere
result.synonyms: pressure, insistency, press, force per unit area, pressure sensation, air pressure, pressure level, insistence, pressing, atmospheric pressure, imperativeness

result.definition: to cause to do through pressure or necessity, by physical, moral or intellectual means :"She forced him to take a job in the city"
